entries.name: profit_after_costs
entries.description: Net sales after discounts/returns minus included costs before tax
entries.notes: Include marketing, payment, and platform fees when available; mark ESTIMATE otherwise

entries.name: mer
entries.description: Media Efficiency Ratio = Net Sales / Total Marketing Spend
entries.notes: Treat influencer spend as marketing_spend; mark missing components when spend not reported

entries.name: growth
entries.description: YoY change in Profit After Costs (Before Tax)
entries.notes: Fallback to YoY Net Sales when profit is ESTIMATE

entries.name: discount_rate
entries.notes: Include promos, markdowns, and bundle discounts

entries.name: returns_rate
entries.notes: Mark ESTIMATE until return confirmations available
